recipe.title: Fennel, Apple, and Gorgonzola Salad
ingredients: 1 1/2 crisp apples, such as Gala or small Fuji, thinly sliced
2 medium fennel bulbs (sometimes called anise; 2 lb total)
instructions: Whisk together lemon juice and oil in a large bowl. Add apples and currants and gently toss. Trim fennel stalks flush with bulbs, discarding stalks, then quarter each bulb. Thinly slice bulbs with a mandoline or other manual slicer. Gently toss fennel with apples and season with salt and pepper. Serve salad topped with Gorgonzola.
